section.title: What is a process ?
section.para: A process is a treatment which is applied to the datas. Their complexity can be changed. Sometimes we can link them with differents applications.
Geotoolkit contains different process. They are order by modules which using to basic treatments.

itemizedlist.listitem: Math : contain mathematical functions like cos(), add(), avg(), ceil(), ...
JTS Geometry : allowing call functions from JTS library on geometries (buffer, contain, intersect, ...)
Vector : operating on features vectorial datas (centroid, merge, spacialJoin, ...)
Referencing : contain for the moment a process to create an EPSG database only.
Coverage : functions for creating pyramids and tiles.
